title: Closing Deals on BALL
subtitle: Finalize your home purchase with ease.

steps.title: Viewing Properties
steps.description: Once you've found the property you're interested in, arrange a viewing through BALL's platform or with the assistance of our support team. This allows you to see the property firsthand and ensure it meets your expectations.

steps.title: Receive Offer Letter
steps.description: After viewing the property and expressing your interest, you'll receive an offer letter from BALL. This letter outlines the terms and conditions of the sale, including the purchase price, payment schedule, and any other relevant details.

steps.title: Sign Offer Letter
steps.description: Review the offer letter carefully and, if satisfied, sign and return it to BALL to indicate your acceptance of the terms. Signing the offer letter is a crucial step in finalizing the deal and moving forward with the purchase.

steps.title: Close the Deal
steps.description: Once the offer letter is signed by both parties, the deal is considered closed. BALL will facilitate the necessary paperwork and processes to transfer ownership of the property to you. Congratulations, you're now a homeowner!
